Body:
I am using boto3 library and using search_index method of iot to search things. I have 3 scenarios:

1) Search thing using full/whole device id

2) Search thing using first few characters of device id

3) Search thing using last few characters of device id

Here is my code:

  response = self.iot_client.search_index(	    queryString=thingName:{}*".format(input)	)

Above code is working in all scenarios but getting no result in 3rd one. I tried below code also. But it is throwing error:

An error occurred (InvalidQueryException) when calling the SearchIndex operation: Unable to parse query
column9:
invalid value - wildcard character (*) is not allowed at the start of the value

res = self.iot_client.search_index(	    queryString="thingName:*{}".format(input)	)

                              

Here is input is whatever is being entered in search string.

Please give possible solutions for this!

"
